website_summaries.verdict: Another non-footed option recognized for its adorable narwhal design and cute accessories.
pros: Summer option with shorter sleeves available for purchase
Built-in narwhal horn, eyes, and flippers
cons: Can shrink if not put in the correct washing cycle

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping of adorable item!
customer_reviews.text: Really fast shipping, especially considering it was coming from overseas. Cute pajamas. They are made of a cheap fabric but we'll see how they wear -- they made it through the first wash beautifully so I'm encouraged.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Mad cute
customer_reviews.text: GF and I got a pair of these to have matching onesies. We got light blue and dark blue, and the colors look nearly identical, not quite as bold as in the photos, but... still comfy and soft, so whatevs.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeMox

customer_reviews.title: How can you not be happy when you're a narwahl
customer_reviews.text: This was my bf's Halloween costume, and our go-to on cold days around the house. How can you not be happy when you're a narwahl?
customer_reviews.author: Kdawg

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my 11 year old is wearing it for Halloween. 4 stars only because the material is on the thin side.
customer_reviews.author: Tara ST

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Runs large in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Runs large in my opinion. I bought a medium, 5 foot 1 and 116 pounds, it’s huge- can curl my whole body inside it. Kind of thin material and you can easily see through under pants/bras through the light material.
customer_reviews.author: Aundria Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Narwhal onesie!!!! Excellent seller!! Best seller I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Breezey
customer_reviews.text: It is Great! It is a little breezey with the buttons but becides that is is AWSOME!!!!!!!! (Don’t know if I spelt breezey right.)
customer_reviews.author: LAK

customer_reviews.title: Awww a bit of a smelly Narwal
customer_reviews.text: Had a chemical smell, not overly strong for others but pretty consistent for the wearer... Cute as heck though
customer_reviews.author: P. Connor Antony

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a friend for her birthday and she loves it! It's so soft and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The length is perfect but it's baggy on her
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium for my daughter who is about 60 inches tall & weighs about 90 lbs. The length is perfect but it's baggy on her. The material is made of fleece. I would have preferred the fuzzy blanket material. She & her friends love it tho.
customer_reviews.author: Texasmom

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST KIGURUMI EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST KIGURUMI EVER!!! I wish I got it in a bigget size, but that's my fault. Anywho! This is sooo comfortable and extremely adorable! I loove it!
customer_reviews.author: Ayeitsmarge

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea who is supposed to wear these but the distant from croch to leg opening is only 12 inches so it's awkward to wear or walk. Maybe that's the style but it was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: OrganizedEntropy

product_meta.title: WOTOGOLD Animal Cosplay Costume Narwhal Unisex Adult Pajamas
feature_bullets: Note:pls refer our size chart, according your height and weight to select your size; the costumes is loose design, you can choose one size up.
XS fit age about 8-12 years, height from 130CM-140CM(51"-55")

S fit for height from 150CM-160CM (59"-63"), M fit for height from 160CM-168CM (63"-66"), L fit for height from 168CM-177CM (66"-70"), XL fit for height from 177CM-188CM (70"-74"), XXL fit for height from 185CM-195CM (71"-77")
All question about the costumes can contact us at first, we will provide you with a satisfactory service.
